staking contract for KTTY token with multiple tiers and reward tokens","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addRewardTokenToTier(uint256,address)":{"details":"Add a reward token to a tier","params":{"tierId":"Tier ID","tokenAddress":"Address of the token to add"}},"addTier(string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Add a new tier","params":{"apy":"Fixed percentage yield (scaled by 1e6, so 0.2% = 2000)","lockupPeriod":"Lockup period in days","maxStake":"Maximum KTTY allowed (0 = unlimited)","minStake":"Minimum KTTY to stake","name":"Tier name"}},"calculateReward(uint256,address)":{"details":"Calculate reward amount for a stake and token","params":{"stakeId":"ID of the stake","tokenAddress":"Address of the reward token (address(0) for KTTY)"},"returns":{"_0":"Amount of reward tokens"}},"claimRewardsAndWithdraw(uint256)":{"details":"Claim all rewards and withdraw stake","params":{"stakeId":"ID of the stake"}},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor","params":{"_kttyToken":"Address of the KTTY token"}},"emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emergency withdraw tokens from the contract","params":{"amount":"Amount of tokens to withdraw","to":"Address to send tokens to","tokenAddress":"Address of the token to withdraw"}},"getRewardTokenCount()":{"details":"Get the number of reward tokens","returns":{"_0":"Number of reward tokens"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getStake(uint256)":{"details":"Get stake details","params":{"stakeId":"Stake ID"},"returns":{"_hasClaimedRewards":"Whether rewards have been claimed","amount":"Amount staked","endTime":"End time of the stake","hasWithdrawn":"Whether the stake has been withdrawn","id":"ID of the stake","owner":"Owner of the stake","startTime":"Start time of the stake","tierId":"Tier ID"}},"getTierCount()":{"details":"Get the number of tiers","returns":{"_0":"Number of tiers"}},"getTierRewardTokens(uint256)":{"details":"Get the reward tokens for a tier","params":{"tierId":"Tier ID"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of token addresses"}},"getUserStakes(address)":{"details":"Get a user's stakes","params":{"owner":"Address of the stake owner"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of stake IDs"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasClaimedRewards(uint256)":{"details":"Check if a stake has claimed rewards","params":{"stakeId":"ID of the stake"},"returns":{"_0":"True if rewards have been claimed"}},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"pause()":{"details":"Pause the contract Only ADMIN or EMERGENCY role can call this"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"registerRewardToken(address,string,uint256)":{"details":"Register a new reward token","params":{"rewardRate":"Reward rate relative to KTTY (scaled by 1e6)","symbol":"Symbol of the token","tokenAddress":"Address of the token"}},"removeRewardTokenFromTier(uint256,address)":{"details":"Remove a reward token from a tier","params":{"tierId":"Tier ID","tokenAddress":"Address of the token to remove"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"stake(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Create a new stake","params":{"amount":"Amount of KTTY to stake","tierId":"Tier ID"}},"stakeExists(uint256)":{"details":"Check if a stake exists","params":{"stakeId":"Stake ID"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the stake exists"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpause the contract Only ADMIN role can call this"},"updateRewardToken(address,uint256,bool)":{"details":"Update a reward token","params":{"isActive":"Whether the token is active","rewardRate":"New reward rate","tokenAddress":"Address of the token"}},"updateTier(uint256,string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"Update an existing tier","params":{"apy":"New annual percentage yield","id":"Tier ID","isActive":"Whether the tier is active","lockupPeriod":"New lockup period in days","maxStake":"New maximum KTTY allowed (0 = unlimited)","minStake":"New minimum KTTY to addRewardTokenToTier(uint256,address).details: Add a reward token to a tier

params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to add

calculateReward(uint256,address).details: Calculate reward amount for a stake and token

params.tokenAddress: Address of the reward token (address(0) for KTTY)

claimRewardsAndWithdraw(uint256).details: Claim all rewards and withdraw stake

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.details: Emergency withdraw tokens from the contract

params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to withdraw

getRewardTokenCount().details: Get the number of reward tokens

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns.hasWithdrawn: Whether the stake has been withdrawn

getTierRewardTokens(uint256).details: Get the reward tokens for a tier

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

hasClaimedRewards(uint256).details: Check if a stake has claimed rewards

returns._0: True if rewards have been claimed

pause().details: Pause the contract Only ADMIN or EMERGENCY role can call this

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.rewardRate: Reward rate relative to KTTY (scaled by 1e6)

removeRewardTokenFromTier(uint256,addres.details: Remove a reward token from a tier

params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to remove

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

unpause().details: Unpause the contract Only ADMIN role can call this

params.stakeId: ID of the stake to withdraw
